messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hi, I am Paul, your inspirational Digital Travel Assistant. I am here to help find a travel destination and travel plan for you. When you think of holiday, what comes to mind?
Sorry, I cannot provide the current date. However, you can easily find out the date by checking your device or asking me to help you find a travel destination and plan.
Can you book me s flight from Zagreb to Zurich?
Could you please confirm the departure date for your flight from Zagreb to Zurich? If you have a return date, please provide that as well.
Could you please confirm the number of passengers and preferred cabin class for your flight from Zagreb to Zurich on the specified dates?
